RBlock: - no label
   UI: select - Find
   UI: text - Title
   UI: text - Author
   UI: text - Subject
   UI: text - Keyword
   UI: text - ISBN
   UI: text - Alibris ID
   UI: select - Method
   UI: checkbox - Find only books eligible for
   UI: select - Binding
   UI: select - Language
   RLine (2): -  Price range
      UI: text - from $
      UI: text - to $
   RLine (2): -  Publication year
      UI: text - after
      UI: text - before
   UI: text - Publisher
   RLine (5): -  Attributes
      UI: checkbox - First edition
      UI: checkbox - Fiction
      UI: checkbox - Signed
      UI: checkbox - Nonfiction
      UI: checkbox - Dust jacket
